alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Helena and East Feliciana Parishes, southeastern Wilkinson and southwestern Amite Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Darlington, or 8 miles east of Clinton, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Clinton, Greensburg, Centreville, Wilson, Norwood, Felps and Darlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
